LanguageData.Captured.label: จับตัวคน
LanguageData.Captured.rulePack.rulesStrings.1: image->[capturer_nameFull] กำลังจับตัว [prisoner_nameFull] [circumstance_group]
LanguageData.Captured.rulePack.rulesStrings.2: image->[capturer_nameFull] มัดมือของ [prisoner_nameFull] ไว้ [circumstance_group]
LanguageData.Captured.rulePack.rulesStrings.3: image->[capturer_nameFull] อัดเข้าไปที่ [prisoner_nameFull] ในขณะที่กำลังจับตัว [circumstance_group]
LanguageData.Captured.rulePack.rulesStrings.4: circumstance_phrase->ขณะที่ [prisoner_pronoun] นอนบิดตัวไปมาอยู่บนพื้น
LanguageData.Captured.rulePack.rulesStrings.5: circumstance_phrase->ขณะที่ [prisoner_pronoun] บิดตัวด้วยความเจ็บปวด
LanguageData.Captured.rulePack.rulesStrings.6: circumstance_phrase->ด้วยประสิทธิภาพแบบมืออาชีพ
LanguageData.Captured.rulePack.rulesStrings.7: circumstance_phrase->อย่างหยาบๆและดูเป็นมือสมัครเล่น
LanguageData.Captured.rulePack.rulesStrings.8: circumstance_phrase->ด้วยการใช้แรงมากเกินไปโดยไม่จำเป็นอย่างเห็นได้ชัด
LanguageData.Captured.rulePack.rulesStrings.9: circumstance_phrase->ด้วยความเพลิดเพลินอย่างเห็นได้ชัด
LanguageData.Captured.rulePack.rulesStrings.10: circumstance_phrase->ขณะที่ยิ้มด้วยความเหนือกว่า
LanguageData.Captured.rulePack.rulesStrings.11: desc_sentence->[capturer_nameShortDef] มองเข้าไปในนัยน์ตาของ [prisoner_nameShortDef] ด้วยความรู้สึกที่เหนือกว่า
LanguageData.Captured.rulePack.rulesStrings.12: desc_sentence->[prisoner_nameShortDef] นั้นบาดเจ็บและดูเหมือนจะเจ็บปวด
LanguageData.Captured.rulePack.rulesStrings.13: desc_sentence->[prisoner_nameShortDef] ดูยอมจำนนต่อชะตาที่ [prisoner_possessive]
LanguageData.Captured.rulePack.rulesStrings.14: desc_sentence->[prisoner_nameShortDef] ขู่ตะคอกด้วยความโกรธที่พ่ายแพ้
LanguageData.Captured.rulePack.rulesStrings.15: desc_sentence->[capturer_nameShortDef] ตบไปที่หน้าของ [prisoner_nameShortDef] เพื่อปราม [prisoner_objective]
LanguageData.Captured.rulePack.rulesStrings.16: desc_sentence->[capturer_nameShortDef] บิดไปที่หูของ [prisoner_nameShortDef]
LanguageData.Captured.rulePack.rulesStrings.17: desc_sentence->[capturer_nameShortDef] จับ [prisoner_nameShortDef] ล็อคข้อต่อไว้
LanguageData.Captured.rulePack.rulesStrings.18: desc_sentence->[capturer_nameShortDef] ถ่มน้ำลายที่หน้าของ [prisoner_nameShortDef]
LanguageData.Captured.rulePack.rulesStrings.19: desc_sentence->[capturer_nameShortDef] หัวเราะขึ้นที่เห็นน้ำตาของ [prisoner_nameShortDef] ค่อยๆปริ่มออกมาในตา
LanguageData.Captured.rulePack.rulesStrings.20: desc_sentence->[capturer_nameShortDef] เตะเข้าไปที่ [prisoner_nameShortDef] โดยไม่มีเหตุผลชัดเจน

desc_sentence->[warden_nameShortDef] is drooling a little bit.

desc_sentence->[prisoner_nameShortDef] seems to have given up entirely.
desc_sentence->[prisoner_nameShortDef] has closed [prisoner_possessive] eyes, seeming to pray to a higher power.

circumstance_phrase->while covered in blood and filth

desc_sentence->[victim_nameShortDef] is screaming with rage and terror.

LanguageData.TamedAnimal.rulePack.rulesStrings.10: desc_sentence->[animal_nameShortDef] appears to be in some sort of hypnotic state.
LanguageData.TamedAnimal.rulePack.rulesStrings.13: desc_sentence->[human_nameShortDef] is projecting a powerful sense of love towards [animal_nameShortDef].
LanguageData.KilledBy.label: ฆ่าโดย
LanguageData.KilledBy.rulePack.rulesStrings.15: desc_sentence->The sun is setting behind them in a symbolic echo of the event.
LanguageData.KilledBy.rulePack.rulesStrings.19: desc_sentence->[victim_nameShortDef]'s eyes are rendered in a realistically lifeless fashion.
LanguageData.KilledBy.rulePack.rulesStrings.22: desc_sentence->[killer_nameShortDef] looks distressed at what [killer_pronoun] is doing.
LanguageData.KilledBy.rulePack.rulesStrings.23: desc_sentence->[killer_nameShortDef] looks pleased with the situation.
LanguageData.SoldPrisoner.label: ขายนักโทษ
LanguageData.SoldPrisoner.rulePack.rulesStrings.0: tale_noun->the selling of [prisoner_nameShortDef] to a trader
LanguageData.SoldPrisoner.rulePack.rulesStrings.3: circumstance_phrase->as the other colonists look on in disapproval
LanguageData.SoldPrisoner.rulePack.rulesStrings.9: desc_sentence->[seller_nameShortDef] reluctantly hands [prisoner_nameShortDef] over to the trader.
LanguageData.SoldPrisoner.rulePack.rulesStrings.10: desc_sentence->[prisoner_nameShortDef] stares defiantly at [prisoner_possessive] new master.
LanguageData.SoldPrisoner.rulePack.rulesStrings.15: desc_sentence->[Prisoner_nameShortDef] is melting into the ground.
LanguageData.SoldPrisoner.rulePack.rulesStrings.16: desc_sentence->[Seller_nameShortDef] is thrusting the chains of [prisoner_nameShortDef] into [trader_nameShortDef]'s hands.
LanguageData.SoldPrisoner.rulePack.rulesStrings.17: desc_sentence->An air of hopelessness pervades the situation.

LanguageData.TrainedAnimal.rulePack.rulesStrings.12: circumstance_phrase->as [human_nameShortDef] thinks of what's for lunch
LanguageData.TrainedAnimal.rulePack.rulesStrings.13: circumstance_phrase->as the other colonists do actual work
LanguageData.TrainedAnimal.rulePack.rulesStrings.18: desc_sentence->[human_nameShortDef] is wrinkling [human_possessive] brow in concentration.
LanguageData.TrainedAnimal.rulePack.rulesStrings.20: desc_sentence->[animal_nameShortDef] has a weapon in [animal_possessive] mouth.
LanguageData.TrainedAnimal.rulePack.rulesStrings.22: desc_sentence->[human_nameShortDef] is shaking [human_possessive] head is frustration.
